channel.title: Gateway reinstall
channel.description:
so the following happens -
Fresh install on 11. First update Gateway crashes during update and becomes unusable. I removed it from the VM and replaced it. Ran both Gateway and workstation.
Am I good or should I have done differently?
thank you

item.title: Gateway reinstall
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

as long as you’ve kept to the standard procedure for doing so and changed the standard passwords (which is a part of said standard procedure) you should be fine, though of course, regarding safety, extensive measures can always be taken.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: Gateway reinstall
item.dc:creator: question1
item.description:
Thanks.

What I did was reimport only the gateway. Updated successfully and ran both whonixchecks without a glich.
All seems in order but I’d like to know if what I did is dangerous in any way and why.

Read full topic

item.title: Gateway reinstall
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

to reinstall Whonix, you’d simply have to reimport the Workstation and Gateway. This of course differs from configuration (KVM vs Qubes vs VBox) to configuration.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
